name: Around Us
description:
Around Us is a 2d prop hunt party game centered around the childhood game “Hide And Seek/Prophunt”.
Originally designed for 5-8 players you can play anywhere from 2-8!

There are over 100+ props to choose from and hide as, that are randomized each time you play,

8+ engaging tasks to complete, including memory games, puzzles, and more!

Everyone is included! while playing, you will never have a dull moment, it is enjoyable no matter what role you get!

You can play among or around your friends! players are randomly selected to be a hunter or a hider,



Hunters main objective is to find the hiders or props and eliminate them,



And the hiders main objective is to finish their tasks without being caught with switching between props and hiding.



You can select how many hunters you would like, and how many tasks the hiders need to complete.

And If you do not have any friends, you can join random lobbys, meet new people, and make more friends.

Get ready to cure your boredom and party with around us, and Wishlist the game today!
